name: Vrerience
detailed_description:
Vrerience is a continuously expanding library of therapeutic VR-experiences and training programs meant to aide professional therapists in treating their clients using virtual reality. By using Vrerience, you acknowledge that you are qualified to give psychological treatment, that you possess the skills required to properly treat a client with any program you intent to use, and that you understand when a program is indeed suitable for that particular client.

Although every Vrerience program has been thoroughly tested, we strongly recommend you to experience any program yourself, before using it in treatment.

Vrerience is a subscription based platform. Every program can be separately purchased as DLC.

Currently available:
  • Fear of Flying
  • Fear of Heights
  • Fear of Spiders
  • Speech Anxiety
Currently In development:
  • Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
  • Anger Management

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB Video RAM (e.g. GeForce GTX 1060 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Oculus Rift + Touch required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K 3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB Video RAM (e.g. GeForce GTX 1060 6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Oculus Rift + Touch required
